DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Planning Target Volume Greater Than Prescription Dose Assessment Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numerical quantity, measured or assigned or computed as a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator, related to radiation therapy planning target volume (PTV) dose coverage being greater than the prescribed dose.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Planning Target Volume Greater Than Prescription Dose Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to radiation therapy planning target volume (PTV) dose coverage being greater than the prescribed dose.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredName: Planning Target Volume Greater Than Prescription Dose Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: A geometrical concept defined to select appropriate beam arrangements, taking into consideration the net effect of all possible geometrical variations, in order to ensure that the prescribed dose is actually absorbed in the clinical target volume.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:A doctor's order for medicine or another intervention.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A geometrical concept defined to select appropriate beam arrangements, taking into consideration the net effect of all possible geometrical variations, in order to ensure that the prescribed dose is actually absorbed in the clinical target volume.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A verbal or written order given by an authorized person instructing a patient to obtain and use a medical device, prescription or undergo a procedure.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed as a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PTV dose coverage greater tha
ReferenceDocuments.description: PTV dose coverage greater than or equal to 95% of the prescribed dose
